author: mreutegg
msg: First implementation of the recovery tool. It supports a dryRun mode, which only checks the repository and logs the result. Without this option, the tool will apply the required changes.

author: jacopoc
msg: The Config class, that was used as an immutable object, is now effectively immutable.

author: mikemccand
msg: fix test to recover from virus checker induced false corruption; also fix it to 'fail fast'

author: mikemccand
msg: fix test to recover from virus checker induced false corruption; also fix it to 'fail fast'

author: markt
msg: Ensure that objects are not validated on borrow when testOnBorrow is set to false, testOnCreate is set to true and the pool is exhausted at the point borrowObject() is called.
